title: You reinstall the game
body:
To comeback to climb on an acc to sell it but no you can't even climb cause one dog sololosses the game regardless of how well you play.
This game is DEAD and gone silver balance team perfected it

replies.body: If you have to blatantly break the rules by boosting, at least be good.

i was when the game wasnt meant for dogs. 
Now even an ex master tier toplane can't win in d5. oh well guess i'm washed up...
or adcs and tanks are broken with Lulu 100% uptime shields ..ohh
litterally takes 8 wins on a dinged acc to get gold if you can't even accomplish that DONT EVEN FUCKING REINSTALL TO TALK SMACK ON BOARDS
who the fucks cares about gold? only diamond and masters matter

> [{quoted}](name=4permas 1smurf,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6XzFuKrh,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-05-09T22:53:49.697+0000)
>
> who the fucks cares about gold? only diamond and masters matter

i'm not a supporter of bots but if you botted accs and then got them to gold from placements you could sell them for 80£ each minimum
vs autisticly wasting weeks struggling in d5 because every1 is still getting used to new runes to earn 400-800£

You reinstall the game to declare your criminal intent.

Admins, arrest this man!
